strapiPost.title: #NWAChampionship Returns This Weekend
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Walmart NW Arkansas Championship presented by P&G
strapiPost.photoCredit: Walmart NW Arkansas Championship presented by P&G
strapiPost.content:
One of the most anticipated weeks of the year is almost here! The 2022 #NWAChampionship returns to Pinnacle Country Club in Rogers on Saturday, September 17, through Sunday, September 25! 

  • The event: With affordable ticket prices and concessions, the region's most spirited 5k, an onsite kids' center, and the local's most beloved food festival â€“ you won't want to miss this! 
  • Attractions: There will be an upgraded hospitality deck, Tyson spectator cafes, and a driving range for golf fans. There will be kids' yoga, #LikeAGirl Day, and a First Tee Junior Golf Zone for families. And for friends, the BITE NW Arkansas Experience, Pinnacle Vodka Bar, and Gatorade Loudest Hole on Tour promise a great time. 

Click HERE for tickets and more information!
